flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
虽说坚硬，但还是虫的外壳。
因为有时也会破裂，
所以禁止用于激烈的战斗。

硬いと　いっても　虫の　殻。
割れてしまうことも　あるので
激しい　戦いは　禁物。

Its shell is hard, but it’s still just a bug shell.
It’s been known to break, so intense battles
with it should be avoided.

La sua corazza è piuttosto dura per un
Pokémon Coleottero, ma potrebbe comunque
rompersi. Meglio evitare lotte troppo veementi.

Su coraza es muy dura, pero no deja de estar
hecha de quitina, por lo que podría quebrarse.
Es mejor no llevarlo en combates muy intensos.

Sein Panzer ist zwar hart, aber dennoch anfällig
für Risse, da es ein Käfer-Pokémon ist.
Für schwere Kämpfe ist es daher ungeeignet.

Même si sa carapace est solide, elle n’est guère
composée que de chitine et peut se briser
aisément. Mieux vaut éviter les combats rudes.

雖說堅硬，但還是蟲的外殼。
有時還是會破裂的，
所以禁止用於激烈的戰鬥。

단단하다고는 해도 벌레의 껍질.
갈라질 수도 있으므로
격렬한 싸움은 금물이다.

かたいと　いっても　むしの　カラ。
われてしまうことも　あるので
はげしい　たたかいは　きんもつ。

体の　カラは　鉄板の　ように　硬い。
あまり　動かないのは　カラの中で　柔らかい
中身が　進化の　準備を　しているからだ。

The shell covering this Pokémon’s body is as hard as an
iron slab. Metapod does not move very much.
It stays still because it is preparing its soft innards for
evolution inside the hard shell.

La corazza di questo Pokémon è dura come una lastra
di ferro. Metapod non si muove molto. Sta immobile per
preparare il morbido interno della dura corazza all’evoluzione.

La capa que recubre el cuerpo de este Pokémon es tan dura
como una plancha de hierro. Metapod apenas se mueve.
Permanece inmóvil para que las vísceras evolucionen dentro
de la coraza que le rodea.

Der Panzer dieses Pokémon ist hart wie Stahl. Safcon bewegt
sich kaum, da es das weiche Innere unter seiner harten Schale
auf seine Entwicklung vorbereitet.

La carapace protégeant ce Pokémon est dure comme du
métal. Chrysacier ne bouge pas beaucoup. Il reste immobile
pour préparer les organes à l’intérieur de sa carapace en vue
d’une évolution future.

몸의 껍질은 철판처럼 단단하다.
움직임이 적은 것은 껍질 안에서 부드러운
몸이 진화 준비를 하고 있어서다.

からだの　カラは　てっぱんの　ように　かたい。
あまり　うごかないのは　カラのなかで　やわらかい
なか が　しんかの　じゅんびを　しているからだ。

体の　カラは　鉄板の　ように　硬い。
あまり　動かないのは　カラの中で　柔らかい
中身が　進化の　準備を　しているからだ。

The shell covering this Pokémon’s body is as hard as an
iron slab. Metapod does not move very much. It stays still
because it is preparing its soft innards for evolution inside
the hard shell.

La corazza di questo Pokémon è dura come una lastra
di ferro. Metapod non si muove molto. Sta immobile per
preparare il morbido interno della dura corazza all’evoluzione.

La capa que recubre el cuerpo de este Pokémon es tan dura
como una plancha de hierro. Metapod apenas se mueve.
Permanece inmóvil para que las vísceras evolucionen dentro
de la coraza que le rodea.

Der Panzer dieses Pokémon ist hart wie Stahl. Safcon bewegt
sich kaum, da es das weiche Innere unter seiner harten Schale
auf seine Entwicklung vorbereitet.

La carapace protégeant ce Pokémon est dure comme du
métal. Chrysacier ne bouge pas beaucoup. Il reste immobile
pour préparer les organes à l’intérieur de sa carapace en vue
d’une évolution future.

몸의 껍질은 철판처럼 단단하다.
움직임이 적은 것은 껍질 안에서 부드러운
몸이 진화 준비를 하고 있어서다.

からだの　カラは　てっぱんの　ように　かたい。
あまり　うごかないのは　カラのなかで　やわらかい
なか が　しんかの　じゅんびを　しているからだ。

殻が　硬くなる前に
強い　衝撃を　受けると
中身が　出てしまうので　注意。

This Pokémon is vulnerable to attack while its shell
is soft, exposing its weak and tender body.

Quando la sua corazza è morbida, il corpo fragile di
questo Pokémon è più vulnerabile agli attacchi.

Este Pokémon es vulnerable al ataque cuando su
coraza es blanda y no lo protege del todo.

Während der Panzer dieses Pokémon sehr weich ist,
bietet er keinen großen Schutz vor Attacken.

Il est vulnérable aux attaques tant que sa carapace
est molle, car il expose son corps tendre et mou.

껍질이 단단해지기 전에
강한 충격을 받으면
속이 나와버리니 주의.

カラが　かたくなるまえに
つよい　しょうげきを　うけると
なかみが　でてしまうので　ちゅうい。

鋼鉄のように　硬い　殻で
やわらかい　中身を　守っている。
進化するまで　じっと　耐えている。

A steel-hard shell protects its tender body.
It quietly endures hardships while
awaiting evolution.

Ha una corazza dura come l’acciaio che protegge
il suo fragile corpo. Attende immobile di evolversi.

Su frágil cuerpo está recubierto de una coraza dura
como el acero. Permanece quieto en su desarrollo.

Der stahlharte Panzer schützt seinen zarten Körper.
Es wartet geduldig auf seine Entwicklung.

Son corps frêle est protégé par sa carapace d’acier.
Il encaisse les coups durs en attendant d’évoluer.

강철같이 단단한 껍질로
부드러운 몸을 보호하고 있다.
진화할 때까지 가만히 참고 있다.

こうてつのように　かたい　カラで
やわらかい　なかみを　まもっている。
しんかするまで　じっと　たえている。

A steel-hard shell protects its
tender body. It quietly endures
hardships while awaiting evolution.

carapace d’acier. Il encaisse les
coups durs en attendant d’évoluer.

It prepares for evolution by hardening
its shell as much as possible
to protect its soft body.

Inside the shell, it is soft and
weak as it prepares to evolve.
It stays motionless in the shell.

A steel-hard shell protects its
tender body. It quietly endures
hardships while awaiting evolution.

A steel-hard shell protects its
tender body. It quietly endures
hardships while awaiting evolution.

A steel-hard shell protects its
tender body. It quietly endures
hardships while awaiting evolution.

This POKéMON is vulnerable to attack
while its shell is soft, exposing its weak
and tender body.

Even though it is encased in a sturdy
shell, the body inside is tender.
It can’t withstand a harsh attack.

Its shell is as hard as an iron slab.
A METAPOD does not move very much
because it is preparing its soft innards
for evolution inside the shell.

The shell covering this POKéMON’s body
is as hard as an iron slab.
METAPOD does not move very much. It stays still because it is preparing
its soft innards for evolution inside
the hard shell.

The shell covering this POKéMON’s body
is as hard as an iron slab.
METAPOD does not move very much. It stays still because it is preparing
its soft innards for evolution inside
the hard shell.

This is its pre-
evolved form. At
this stage, it can only harden, so it
remains motionless
to avoid attack.

It prepares for
evolution by har­
dening its shell as much as possi­
ble to protect its
soft body.

Inside the shell,
it is soft and
weak as it pre­ pares to evolve.
It stays motion­
less in the shell.

Hardens its shell
to protect itself.
However, a large impact may cause
it to pop out of
its shell.

This POKéMON is
vulnerable to
attack while its shell is soft,
exposing its weak
and tender body.

This POKéMON is
